Package healpix.plot3d.gui.healpix3d

This package contains the java3d classes to plot a healpix map on a 3D sphere to interact with.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RotateAble Appears to be interface to graphic objects which can be rotated.
 

Class Summary
DataSphere Despite name represents a single Healpix face.
FaceSphere Creates a Healpix Face tesselation
HealCanvas The Class HealCanvas.
HealPanel The Class HealPanel.
HealpixDataIndex This class is used to construct the quad geometry for the 3d sphere.
HealpixPixelDataSphere Despite name represents a single Healpix face.
HealSphere A base class for different healpix sphere representations (??).
NestSphere The Class NestSphere.
QuadArrayExt Quadrilatere Array with tooltip fonctionality ready to be used by DataSphere.
RingSphere Creates a Ring Healpix tesselasition
RotatePanel The Class RotatePanel.
SimplePanel JPanel on the right hand of the MapCanvas, displaying the different action to to interact with Healpix sphere.
ZoneSphere Part of the HealSphere
 

Package healpix.plot3d.gui.healpix3d Description

This package contains the java3d classes to plot a healpix map on a 3D sphere to interact with.
